body:
Hey all the kind and loving people on Avicus. I am in the middle of making my second walls video but I want you all to see my channel and be ready for my next couple of videos on Avicus.
The address is https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCk5xjVgC7TpZ1QnB3UWYENg

Hope you will consider subscribing to me and wish me luck on my staff application when they open up again in 2015, new year new luck :D

title: YouTube Channel

replies.body: It is impossible to watch your videos with the amount of lag it is, sorry.
replies.body_tagged: It is impossible to watch your videos with the amount of lag it is, sorry.

replies.body: As S3M3L said, it is so laggy, I would also recomend playing fullscreen.
replies.body_tagged: As S3M3L said, it is so laggy, I would also recomend playing fullscreen.

replies.body: I can't play fill screen because my recording set doesn't like it so u can't blame me on that one and the lag was my old recording set so u will have to deal with my channel being a little leggy but my new walls video will hopefully have no lag.

replies.body: What software do you use to record?
replies.body_tagged: What software do you use to record?

replies.body:
EZ Vid allows you to go fullscreen.
What you have to do is to "trim" the screen size, and then just drag each 4 sides to fit your game, and not record your taskbar and top of the screen.
